turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Bedtime (TV series).
turn.1: What was the TV series Bedtime about?
turn.2: Bedtime (TV series) Bedtime is a British comedy-drama written and directed by Andy Hamilton and broadcast by the BBC.
turn.4: It ran for three series for a total of fifteen episodes between August 2001 and December 2003.
turn.5: How many episodes did it have?
turn.6: The first two series had six episodes each and the third series had three episodes.
turn.8: All three series have been released on DVD.
turn.9: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.10: The story centers around the bedtime conversations of couples – or in one case a father and son – living in adjoining houses on a suburban London street.
turn.12: An older married couple, Andrew and Alice Oldfield (played by Timothy West and Sheila Hancock), appear in all three series.
